response.original_title: Night of Yamanote Line 夜の山手線 外回り
response.overview: Tokyo, a Global Metropolis  Surrounded by towering buildings, Tokyo transforms into a fantastical world at night. The city comes alive with lights spilling from office buildings, brightly lit station platforms, and colorful neon glows. Experience Tokyo's night as you journey on the E231 series train.  This work captures the Yamanote Line Outer Loop at night, starting from Shinagawa Station. Right after departure, the train curves towards Osaki Station, illuminated by office lights and busy car headlights. The train proceeds to Shibuya, where neon lights beautify the tracks. Passing through Shinjuku, the train heads north, leaving the city center for a quieter view along the line. The contrast with the bustling city center is striking. At Ueno Station, the train runs past the lively Ameya-Yokocho, heading back to the city center. The highlight is around Tokyo Station, where towering skyscrapers create a breathtaking flood of light.
response.title: Night of Yamanote Line - Outer Loop
